member.name: HEAPLIST32
member.summary: Describes an entry from a list that enumerates the heaps used by a specified process.

member.name: HEAPLIST32.dwSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. Before calling the function, set this member to sizeof(HEAPLIST32). If you do not initialize dwSize,Heap32ListFirst will fail.

member.name: HEAPLIST32.th32ProcessID
member.summary: The identifier of the process to be examined.

member.name: HEAPLIST32.th32HeapID
member.summary: The heap identifier. This is not a handle, and has meaning only to the tool help functions.

summary.para: This member can be one of the following values.
